from dataclasses import dataclass

@dataclass
class Triple:
    subject: str
    predicate: str
    object: str

# EVOLVE-BLOCK-START

def predict(triples: list[Triple]) -> str:
    # Create a dictionary of predicates and their corresponding sentences
    sentence_dict = {
        "cityServed": "The city of {} is served by {}.",
        "country": "The country of {} is {}.",
        "capital": "The capital of {} is {}.",
        "elevationAboveTheSeaLevel": "{} has an elevation of {} meters above sea level.",
        "location": "{} is located in {}.",
        "operatingOrganisation": "{} is operated by {}.",
        "runwayLength": "The runway length of {} is {} meters.",
        "runwayName": "The runway name of {} is {}.",
        "isPartOf": "{} is part of {}.",
        "1stRunwayLengthFeet": "The first runway of {} is {} feet long.",
        "1stRunwaySurfaceType": "The first runway surface type of {} is {}.",
        "3rdRunwayLengthFeet": "The third runway of {} is {} feet long.",
        "icaoLocationIdentifier": "The ICAO location identifier of {} is {}.",
        "locationIdentifier": "The location identifier of {} is {}.",
        "elevationAboveTheSeaLevelInFeet": "{} has an elevation of {} feet above sea level.",
        "iataLocationIdentifier": "The IATA location identifier of {} is {}.",
        "nativeName": "{} is also known as {}.",
        "leaderParty": "{} is led by the {}.",
        "language": "The official language of {} is {}.",
        "owner": "{} is owned by {}.",
        "1stRunwayLengthMetre": "The first runway of {} is {} meters long.",
        "4thRunwaySurfaceType": "The fourth runway surface type of {} is {}.",
        "largestCity": "The largest city in {} is {}.",
        "4thRunwayLengthFeet": "The fourth runway of {} is {} feet long.",
        "elevationAboveTheSeaLevelInMetres": "{} has an elevation of {} meters above sea level.",
        "administrativeArrondissement": "{} is in the {}.",
        "officialLanguage": "The official language of {} is {}.",
        "regionServed": "{} serves the region of {}.",
    }

    # Extract the subject and predicate from the first triple
    subject = triples[0].subject
    predicate = triples[0].predicate

    # Check if the predicate is in the dictionary
    if predicate in sentence_dict:
        # Get the corresponding sentence template
        sentence_template = sentence_dict[predicate]

        # Replace the placeholders in the sentence template with the subject and object
        sentence = sentence_template.format(subject, triples[0].object)

        # Return the completed sentence
        return sentence
    else:
        # If the predicate is not in the dictionary, return the original sentence
        return f"The {triples[0].predicate} of {triples[0].subject} is {triples[0].object}."

# EVOLVE-BLOCK-END
